oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Allen, Matt F., 1917 March 17
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Matt F. Allen, dated August 8th, 1908. Illustrates the first page of the document. Allen’s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on March 17th, 1917. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Allen family
